RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 1 1M Turf CR: 97. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 17700. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $7,500 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $12,500. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Over Since August 20, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. S uch A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Claiming Races For $7,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred). (If transferred to the Main Track, this race will be run at One Mile and 70 Yards.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: AUTHORITARIAN nursed along from inside to far turn, tipped out for run while ridden out to go clear. DEVOTED TO YOU speed to set pace to far turn, could not contain winner second best. SILENT CHAOS perfect position to raced along evenly for the show spot. SCAT SHACK chased pace to the stretch but,gave in through the stretch run. BARRISTER TOM raced back with no late response when needed. COME SEE ABOUT IT raced along evenly with no kick in the stretch run. PERFECT PAINTING never a menace. AMENDED through after half, dropped back. Race was hand timed due to a bad sensor on the turf course, all turf races will be hand timed for the remainder of the meet. Acm

ENTRY.NAME: Authoritarian
ENTRY.COMMENT: nursed along from inside to far turn, tipped out for run, clear

ENTRY.NAME: Scat Shack
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace to the stretch, gave in through the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Silent Chaos
ENTRY.COMMENT: perfect position to raced along evenly for the show spot

ENTRY.NAME: Devoted to You
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed to set pace to far turn, could not contain winner 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Perfect Painting
ENTRY.COMMENT: never a menace

ENTRY.NAME: Barrister Tom
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced back with no late response when needed

ENTRY.NAME: Come See About It
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly with no kick in the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Amended
ENTRY.COMMENT: through after half, dropped back

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 2 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 62. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 20 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: AIN'T SHE A PISTOL quick to the front, well handled throughout and held sway to wire.. MARKET OF STOCKS good position never far back to the turn, off rail run for place. COLUMN unhurried to the turn, circled six wide into stretch for third. C C'S WORLD off rail position to turn, five wide run stretch run to move up. SWEET TOOTSIE LU broke well stalking winner from inside to the stretch, gave in. COMPETITIVE FIRE tried to keep up from off rail, faltered from quarter pole.

ENTRY.NAME: Market of Stocks
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position never far back to the turn, off rail run for place

ENTRY.NAME: Column
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried to the turn, circled six wide into stretch for third

ENTRY.NAME: C C's World
ENTRY.COMMENT: off rail position to turn, five wide run stretch run to move up

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Tootsie Lu
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke well stalking winner from inside to the stretch, gave in

ENTRY.NAME: Competitive Fire
ENTRY.COMMENT: tried to keep up from off rail, faltered from quarter pole

ENTRY.NAME: Ain't She a Pistol
ENTRY.COMMENT: quick to the front, well handled throughout, held sway to wire

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 3 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 83. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 14400. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $8,000. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Over Since August 20, 202 3 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $8,000 (Claiming Races For $7,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HOT DAME speed to duel early, cleared to far turn stout handling to widen in the final furlong. PELLETIER inside trip to far turn, tipped out for clear run for place. TAMI ANN no speed to far turn, rallied along stretch, drifted in, showed. OLIVIA'S JOY unhurried to far turn, four wide run into stretch, weakened late. MEMPHIS CASH QUEEN no speed inside to far turn with no late kick in the stretch run. OFF THE CHARTS bit tardy start with response when needed. SUM KINDA PRETTY dueled early on, starting a steady decline from quarter pole.

ENTRY.COMMENT: inside trip to far turn, tipped out for clear run for place

ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled early on, starting a steady decline from quarter pole

ENTRY.COMMENT: speed to duel early, cleared to far turn stout handling to widen

ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed inside to far turn with no late kick in the stretch run

ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed to far turn, rallied along stretch, drifted in, showed

ENTRY.NAME: Off the Charts
ENTRY.COMMENT: bit tardy start with response when needed

ENTRY.NAME: Olivia's Joy
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried to far turn, four wide run into stretch, leveled off

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 79. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE MARCH 20, 2023 OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES IN 2022 - 2023. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TOMAHAWK KITTEN between horses to the half, four wide run into stretch, cleared. ARTEMUS EAGLE chased to half, took over to far turn, dueled stretch, outkicked. MIDNIGHT NIGHTMARE wide run first turn. CONGRATS THIS slow into stride, inside run to contend at the half, kept on late. MIDNIGHT BLUE NOTE inside speed from inside, gave way readily from far turn. TORNADO BOY six wide run into first turn while showing little from that point. CAPE MARCO DRIVE stayed to the half with a steady the half.

ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed from inside, gave way readily from far turn

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 5 5F Turf CR: 92. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 17800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR OHIO BRED OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $16,000. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since August 20, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $15,000). (If transfe rred to the Main Track, this race will be run at Five Furlongs.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: THATSAFACTJACK sprinted clear on the lead, stayed clear in the stretch held sway. HUNTERTOWN good position never far back, rallied on in stretch, good effort. EXPROMPT (FR) hopped with an awkward start from gate, late interest in stretch. FORT LOWELL raced back to the stretch from inside, angled out good finish. WHAT A RUSH chased leader to the stretch with no late response in late going. BERN N ASH could not keep from far outside around turn, finished well late. FLYING HOUDINI raced evenly throughout, failed to response when needed. COUNTRY CLUB BOBBY hustled along from gate, good position inside to stretch faded. TALKSCHEAP close up to the turn with o response when needed. MORE CHANCES squeezed back at the start, never menaced thereafter. FIXITWITHFORWARD never reached contention. Race was hand timed due to a bad sensor on the turf course, all turf races will be hand timed for the remainder of the meet. Acm

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 6 1M Dirt CR: 69. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since August 20, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PRINCE OF ROSES spurted clear from the gate to the front, maintained advantage under good handling to the wire while ridden out. MY FAVORITE UNCLE well placed chasing top pair, lost position into the far turn turn and rallied into the stretch run to battle back for the place spot. COMMANDER COMPTON raced along evenly throughout with no response when needed. EL MIC TIESUN no speed to far turn and only improved position from the far turn. FRADY chased winner to the stretch, could not go on faded back. BELL CURVE tracked top pair to far turn while fading in the stretch run. DISCOUNT DENNIS broke slow from the gate and never menaced thereafter far back.

ENTRY.NAME: My Favorite Uncle
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed chasing top pair, lost position turn, came back late

ENTRY.NAME: Commander Compton
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly throughout with no response when needed

ENTRY.NAME: El Mic Tiesun
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed to far turn and only improved position from the far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Frady
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased winner to the stretch, could not go on faded back

ENTRY.COMMENT: broke slow from the gate and never menaced thereafter far back

ENTRY.OWNER: Esquivel Maria and Esquivel Jose Jesus
ENTRY.COMMENT: spurted clear from the gate to the front, maintained advantage

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 7 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 95. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 14400. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $10,000. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Over Since August 20, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. S uch A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000 (Claiming Races For $7,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RAISON KARTER tracked leader to far turn, headed at quarter pole with a strong kick in the stretch to go well clear. ICE BLAST good position to far turn, kept on to rally on for place spot. HENDRIX speed to the lead, stayed past the quarter pole for show spot. BASTIEN LE BROWN close up early, dropped back readily with no response when needed. TWO COOKIE RULE tried to keep to far turn with nothing left in the stretch run. CAROM had a steady fade throughout.

ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leader to far turn, headed at quarter pole, strong kick

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 8 1M Turf CR: 69. Maiden Claiming Purse 9100. FOR MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred). (If transferred to the Main Track, this race will be run at One Mile and 70 Yards.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: THALBERG shuffled first turn, saved ground far turn, split horses cleared. SCHOOLMASTER (GER) unhurried early, widest run into stretch, gained head bob. THE POINT ROAD outside first turn, stayed wide far turn, just missed. THE RED FOX saved ground while attending the pace to far turn, gutsy effort. BIALYSTOCK spurted clear between horses into first turn, weakened far turn. TROY BOY good position to far turn, could not go on, gave in grudging late. MR YETTIE off rail trip to far turn no late response. RAGING WHIRLWIND raced back to far turn, kept on with no late response in stretch. BACON between horses down the backstretch, no late action in the lane. GOOD SOUL through early, dropped back readily. Race was hand timed due to a bad sensor on the turf course, all turf races will be hand timed for the remainder of the meet. Acm
